name: SPD-Ukraine
description:
SPD-Ukraine is a leading provider of software development services proved by number of SIIA CODiE Awards. The Company has been specializing in Custom Web and Mobile development for more than 11 years.
SPD-Ukraine provides comprehensive software development and can help you in eCommerce, Finance (Investment), Affiliate Marketing, White-Label Platforms, IoT and other software.

Our employees are certified with Oracle Java, ISTQB, Scrum Master and their main technology specializations include Java, JS (Angular, React), iOS, Android, SQL/noSQL DBs, Docker (and others).
The products of two of our major clients have been developed from scratch with the help of SPD-Ukraine for about 10 years. 

These companies have now been purchased by Public companies and we passed due diligence while one of their acquisition. 
We believe that our deep experience will be useful for your company as well.
